details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:2024 - 8.2 logical structure - 8.2.5.25 List (L, LI, LBody) - Real content within LI
details.description: Any real content within an LI structure element that is not enclosed in an Lbl structure element shall be enclosed in an LBody structure element

rule.description: Any real content within an LI structure element that is not enclosed in an Lbl structure element shall be enclosed in an LBody structure element

error.message: The LI structure element contains real content as its direct child instead of enclosing it into Lbl or LBody structure elements
